response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $8,000 to me, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and the effort put into its creation. I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $7,200, hoping to make it accessible while still ensuring fair compensation for my investment. Please let me know if you are interested in exploring this offer further. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 7200}
